Member Function Documentation

virtual double icam::IExposureParams::GetDelayTime ( ) const
pure virtual

Get delay time.

Delay time is time between trigger and exposure begin.

Returns
delay time in seconds or negative value if this value isn't active.

Implemented in icam::CExposureParamsComp.
